enemy_1113_empace_2.ability: Uses ranged attacks when not blocked; gains greatly increased ATK when HP drops under half.

enemy_1114_rgrdmn.name: Possessed Sarkaz Centurion
enemy_1114_rgrdmn.description: A Sarkaz mercenary unwittingly converted into one of Mephisto's Herd, able to damage multiple targets at once and drain vitality from its victims. Prevents others from entering the Sarcophagus - do not push too far in, and you may yet avoid their wrath.
enemy_1114_rgrdmn.ability: Attacks 3 targets at once; Restores a certain amount of HP after each attack based upon damage dealt.

enemy_1114_rgrdmn_2.name: Possessed Sarkaz Centurion Nidus Guard
enemy_1114_rgrdmn_2.description: A Sarkaz mercenary leader unwittingly converted into one of Mephisto's Herd, able to damage multiple targets at once and drain vitality from its victims. More ferociously prevents others from entering the Sarcophagus.
enemy_1114_rgrdmn_2.ability: Attacks 3 targets at once; Restores a certain amount of HP after each attack based upon damage dealt.

enemy_1115_embald.name: 'Emperor's Blade'
enemy_1115_embald.description: A manifestation of a certain will in Ursus. The most terrifying military force in the entirety of Ursus, they are widely-known throughout the world only as horrifying spectres of legend and yore. A single one is enough to slaughter entire squads. Defeat has never been a possibility.
enemy_1115_embald.ability: Unable to attack, and does not deduct Life Points upon escaping; Permanently applies [Weaken] to Talulah, the Fighter (Greatly reduces DEF and RES).

enemy_3001_upeopl.name: Ursus Civilian
enemy_3001_upeopl.description: An ordinary Ursus citizen caught in the crossfire. A part of the cruelty and suffering of this world.
enemy_3001_upeopl.ability: Does not deplete Life Points when escaping, but will instead deduct 1 Life Point upon dying; Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter.

enemy_3002_ftrtal.name: Talulah, the Fighter
enemy_3002_ftrtal.description: The Infected warrior, Talulah. She will never look back.
enemy_3002_ftrtal.ability: Does not deduct Life Points when entering the enemy Incursion Point, but will instead deduct 1 Life Point upon destruction; Applies [Burning Breath] to an enemy within attack range (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be <$ba.buffres>resisted</>); Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter.

enemy_1116_liprr.name: Ordinary Prisoner
enemy_1116_liprr.description: A commonly seen prisoner of Mansfield State Prison. Even so, don't let your guard down or he'll slip past you.
enemy_1116_liprr.ability: After being freed, gains increased ATK.

enemy_1116_liprr_2.name: Seasoned Prisoner
enemy_1116_liprr_2.description: An inmate deeply familiar with the laws of survival of Mansfield State Prison. Will utilize his accumulated experience to outsmart you and is difficult to deal with.
enemy_1116_liprr_2.ability: After being freed, gains increased ATK.

enemy_1117_liiprr.name: Sniper Prisoner
enemy_1117_liiprr.description: An inmate who cobbled together a ranged weapon to avoid getting into brawls. Knows a little about Originium Arts and can strengthen his 'arrows'.
enemy_1117_liiprr.ability: After being freed, attacks instead deal Arts damage; Prioritizes attacking Imprisonment Devices.

enemy_1117_liiprr_2.name: Elite Sniper Prisoner
enemy_1117_liiprr_2.description: An inmate experienced at using handmade ranged weapons. Though far from a master in Originium Arts, his arrows are already extremely dangerous.
enemy_1117_liiprr_2.ability: After being freed, attacks instead deal Arts damage; Prioritizes attacking Imprisonment Devices.

enemy_1118_lidbox.name: Pugilist Prisoner
enemy_1118_lidbox.description: An inmate who puts his trust in his fists. ——In reality, the metal chains on his wrists are doing most of the work.
enemy_1118_lidbox.ability: After being freed, attacks ignore a certain portion of the target's DEF.

enemy_1118_lidbox_2.name: Elite Pugilist Prisoner
enemy_1118_lidbox_2.description: An inmate who wholeheartedly trusts in his fists. Do not underestimate this inmate who is able to utilize both fist and chain in harmony now.
enemy_1118_lidbox_2.ability: After being freed, attacks ignore a certain portion of the target's DEF.

enemy_1119_vofsd.name: Strongman Prisoner
enemy_1119_vofsd.description: An inmate with great strength. The weapons in his hands seem to have been acquired from ransacking a storage room. During a melee, will often rush to the frontline and inflict great damage.
enemy_1119_vofsd.ability: After being freed, gains increased RES and regenerates HP over time.

enemy_1119_vofsd_2.name: Herculean Prisoner
enemy_1119_vofsd_2.description: An inmate with immense strength. The weapons in his hands seem to have been acquired from ransacking a storage room. During a melee, will often rush to the frontline and inflict great damage.
enemy_1119_vofsd_2.ability: After being freed, gains increased RES and regenerates HP over time.

enemy_1120_vofwiz.name: Caster Prisoner
enemy_1120_vofwiz.description: An inmate with a weak constitution. Due to being unable to overcome his bindings on his own, he's instead learned to utilize defensive techniques using the devices on his body. On the other hand, he's well-versed in Originium Arts and will become very difficult to deal with should he be freed.
enemy_1120_vofwiz.ability: Increases the ASPD of all enemies on the battlefield; When imprisoned, gains increased DEF but is unable to attack; After being freed, attacks two targets at once; Prioritizes attacking Imprisonment Devices.

enemy_1120_vofwiz_2.name: Deadly Caster Prisoner
enemy_1120_vofwiz_2.description: An inmate with a weak constitution. Due to being unable to overcome his bindings on his own, he's instead learned to utilize defensive techniques using the devices on his body. On the other hand, he's extremely well-versed in Originium Arts and will become very difficult to deal with should he be freed.
enemy_1120_vofwiz_2.ability: Greatly increases the ASPD of all enemies on the battlefield; When imprisoned, gains increased DEF but is unable to attack; After being freed, attacks two targets at once; Prioritizes attacking Imprisonment Devices.

enemy_1121_lifbos.name: Recidivist
enemy_1121_lifbos.description: A vicious inmate feared by inmates and guards alike. Has learned patience after his long stay in prison, and pays no attention to normal attacks and provocations. However, avoid enraging him at all costs, or be prepared to face the consequences.
enemy_1121_lifbos.ability: When imprisoned, gains increased DEF; When freed for the first time, immediately frees all other enemies.

enemy_1121_lifbos_2.name: Infamous Recidivist
enemy_1121_lifbos_2.description: A legendary prisoner whose might is second only to that of Anthony. Has learned patience after his long stay in prison, and pays no attention to normal attacks and provocations. However, avoid enraging him at all costs, or be prepared to face the consequences.
enemy_1121_lifbos_2.ability: When imprisoned, gains increased DEF; When freed for the first time, immediately frees all other enemies.

enemy_1122_sphond.name: 'Angry'
enemy_1122_sphond.description: A beastly Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. It has a bad temper and likes to eat apricots. It follows its master's wishes and frolics about in the painting scroll, occasionally taking a bite out of it.

enemy_1122_sphond_2.name: Anxious 'Angry'
enemy_1122_sphond_2.description: A beastly Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. It has an even worse temper and doesn't want to eat apricots anymore. It follows its master's wishes and frolics about in the painting scroll, occasionally taking a bite out of it.

enemy_1123_spsbr.name: 'Bitey'
enemy_1123_spsbr.description: A common Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. It's very smart and actually understands human speech. Apparently some kind of communal organism, it gets lonely when left by itself. It has done many a mean thing out of amusement for it's just an Ink Spirit, no matter how smart.

enemy_1123_spsbr_2.name: Serious 'Bitey'
enemy_1123_spsbr_2.description: A common Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. It's very smart and actually understands human speech. Apparently some kind of communal organism, it gets lonely when left by itself. Now it's actually getting down to business like a real Ink Spirit.

enemy_1124_spbow.name: 'Stabby'
enemy_1124_spbow.description: A crafty Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Very proud of itself and its tricks. Not above letting its allies charge straight into traps before betraying them. It will prioritize attacking opposite attribute enemies.

enemy_1124_spbow_2.name: Flanking 'Stabby'
enemy_1124_spbow_2.description: A crafty Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Very proud of itself and its tricks. Instinctively suppresses its enemies by attacking their weak spots for damage. It will prioritize attacking opposite attribute enemies.

enemy_1125_spshld.name: 'Lazy'
enemy_1125_spshld.description: A majestic Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Looks weird, just like it's carrying a mountain on its back. Since it doesn't move much, it's often taken for a decorative feature. Can draw enemies to attack it, unfathomably tough.
enemy_1125_spshld.ability: More likely to be targeted by attacks.

enemy_1125_spshld_2.name: Unmoving 'Lazy'
enemy_1125_spshld_2.description: A majestic Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Looks weird, just like it's carrying a mountain on its back. As still as a mountain when not moving, but bears down on its enemies like boulders tumbling down a mountain when in a team. Can draw enemies to attack it, unfathomably tough.
enemy_1125_spshld_2.ability: More likely to be targeted by attacks.

enemy_1126_spslme.name: 'Smarty'
enemy_1126_spslme.description: A strange Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Seems to be alive. Very lively with its movements and likes to wander around. Not very commonly seen as it explodes if it touches any fellow Ink Spirits with opposite attributes.
enemy_1126_spslme.ability: Can only be blocked by player's units of the same attribute. Explodes upon death, dealing Arts damage to our units. Causes even greater damage if friendly units of opposite attribute are in its vicinity.

enemy_1126_spslme_2.name: Dazzled 'Smarty'
enemy_1126_spslme_2.description: A strange Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Seems to be alive. Very lively with its movements and likes to wander around. It explodes if it touches any fellow Ink Spirits with opposite attributes, so any survivors tend to be even more powerful.
enemy_1126_spslme_2.ability: Can only be blocked by player's units of the same attribute. Explodes upon death, dealing Arts damage to our units. Causes even greater damage if friendly units of opposite attribute are in its vicinity.

enemy_1127_sptrkg.name: 'Blindey'
enemy_1127_sptrkg.description: A reckless Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Rushes forward single-mindedly, its surroundings be damned, and tends to find itself in all kinds of predicaments because of that. Doesn't get along with Stabby. Can only be blocked by units of the same attribute.
enemy_1127_sptrkg.ability: Can only be blocked by player's units of the same attribute.

enemy_1127_sptrkg_2.name: Indefatigable 'Blindey'
enemy_1127_sptrkg_2.description: A reckless Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Still rushes forward single-mindedly, as though its sole purpose in life is to march forward. Doesn't get along with Stabby. Can only be blocked by units of the same attribute.
enemy_1127_sptrkg_2.ability: Can only be blocked by player's units of the same attribute.

enemy_1128_spmage.name: 'Envy'
enemy_1128_spmage.description: A fearsome Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Frightening in appearance and feared by all. Very territorial and doesn't get along with most other Ink Spirits. Actually a very nervous guy who has trouble sleeping. Arts can shift Hui and Ming.
enemy_1128_spmage.ability: Can charge its attacks. If not interrupted, causes Arts damage and shifts target's Ming and Hui attribute.

enemy_1128_spmage_2.name: Complicated 'Envy'
enemy_1128_spmage_2.description: A fearsome Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Frightening in appearance and feared by all. Very territorial and doesn't get along with most other Ink Spirits. Its emotions and behavioral patterns are particularly complex, perhaps even more so than mere man. Arts can shift Hui and Ming.
enemy_1128_spmage_2.ability: Can charge its attacks. If not interrupted, causes Arts damage and shifts target's Ming and Hui attribute.

enemy_1129_spklr.name: 'Fury'
enemy_1129_spklr.description: A strong Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Large and robust, but not very good at thinking. Tends to fall into the simplest traps and needs Bitey to save its ass. Gains attack power against opposite attribute enemies.
enemy_1129_spklr.ability: Greatly increases ATK when attacking opposite attribute targets

enemy_1129_spklr_2.name: Unbridled 'Fury'
enemy_1129_spklr_2.description: A strong Ink Spirit named by the painter herself. Its great power and might is how it frees itself from the worries of having to think, allowing it to destroy all in its wake with its flaming inferno. Other than its buddy Bitey, that is. Gains attack power against opposite attribute enemies.
enemy_1129_spklr_2.ability: Greatly increases ATK when attacking opposite attribute targets

enemy_1130_infstr.name: Originiutant Puppet
enemy_1130_infstr.description: A corpse being controlled by a parasitic Originiutant Excrescence.

enemy_1131_sbeast.name: Mutant Sand Beast
enemy_1131_sbeast.description: A sand beast infected by an Originiutant. Sand beasts are a species of small-sized omnivores that primarily inhabit deserts and hamadas. They are nocturnal in nature and are often tamed by the local Sargonians to be used as hunting beasts.

enemy_1131_sbeast_2.name: Mutant Sand Beast α
enemy_1131_sbeast_2.description: A sand beast infected and severely mutated by an Originiutant. Sand beasts are a species of small-sized omnivores that primarily inhabit deserts and hamadas. They are nocturnal in nature and are often tamed by the local Sargonians to be used as hunting beasts.

enemy_1132_sarchn.name: Mutant Rock Spider
enemy_1132_sarchn.description: A rock spider infected by an Originiutant. Due to their similar appearances, rock spiders are often mistakenly believed to be a close relative of Infused Originium Slugs. However, the latest research shows that they are two completely different species.

enemy_1132_sarchn_2.name: Mutant Rock Spider α
enemy_1132_sarchn_2.description: A rock spider infected and severely mutated by an Originiutant. Due to their similar appearances, rock spiders are often mistakenly believed to be a close relative of Infused Originium Slugs. However, the latest research shows that they are two completely different species.

enemy_1133_harchn.name: Mutant Giant Rock Spider
enemy_1133_harchn.description: A giant rock spider infected by an Originiutant. Giant rock spiders are a subspecies of rock spider found only in Sargon. They possess a large circular abdomen used to store energy.
enemy_1133_harchn.ability: Periodically creates an <Originiutant Excrescence>; Splits into 4 <Originiutant Excrescences> upon death

enemy_1133_harchn_2.name: Mutant Giant Rock Spider α
enemy_1133_harchn_2.description: A giant rock spider infected and severely mutated by an Originiutant. Giant rock spiders are a subspecies of rock spider found only in Sargon. They possess a large circular abdomen used to store energy.
enemy_1133_harchn_2.ability: Periodically creates an <Originiutant Tumor>; Splits into 4 <Originiutant Tumors> upon death

enemy_1134_diamd.name: Originiutant
enemy_1134_diamd.description: An Originiutant mutant that was weaponized for some purpose. Possesses an incredibly tough outer shell.

enemy_1134_diamd_2.name: Originiutant α
enemy_1134_diamd_2.description: An Originiutant mutant that was weaponized for some purpose. Even more ferocious and terrifying than usual.

enemy_1135_redman.name: 'Redmark' Eradicator
enemy_1135_redman.description: A special mercenary sniper who excels at ambushing targets exposed in harsh environments. 'Redmark Contracts' are tailor-made for elite and powerful mercenaries with a distinct lack of morals. The initiators of such contracts are ruthless and definitely up to no good.
enemy_1135_redman.ability: <$ba.invisible>Invisible</>; Only performs ranged attacks against allied units caught inside the <Sandstorm>

enemy_1135_redman_2.name: 'Redmark' Elite Eradicator
enemy_1135_redman_2.description: An elite mercenary sniper who excels at ambushing targets exposed in harsh environments. 'Redmark Contracts' are tailor-made for elite and powerful mercenaries with a distinct lack of morals. The initiators of such contracts are ruthless and definitely up to no good.
enemy_1135_redman_2.ability: <$ba.invisible>Invisible</>; Only performs ranged attacks against allied units caught inside the <Sandstorm>

enemy_1136_redace.name: 'Redmark' Infiltrator
enemy_1136_redace.description: A special mercenary infiltrator who carries high-tech projection equipment, specializing in infiltrating enemy forces within harsh environments. 'Redmark Contracts' are tailor-made for elite and powerful mercenaries with a distinct lack of morals. The initiators of such contracts are ruthless and definitely up to no good.
enemy_1136_redace.ability: When receiving damage for the first time, creates a <Holographic Mirage>; While the mirage exists, cannot be blocked and become less likely to be attacked; Gains Physical and Arts Dodge while within the Sandstorm

enemy_1136_redace_2.name: 'Redmark' Elite Infiltrator
enemy_1136_redace_2.description: An elite mercenary infiltrator who carries high-tech projection equipment, specializing in infiltrating enemy forces within harsh environments. 'Redmark Contracts' are tailor-made for elite and powerful mercenaries with a distinct lack of morals. The initiators of such contracts are ruthless and definitely up to no good.
enemy_1136_redace_2.ability: When receiving damage for the first time, creates a <Holographic Mirage MK2>; While the mirage exists, cannot be blocked and become less likely to be attacked; Gains Physical and Arts Dodge while within the Sandstorm

enemy_1137_plasm.name: Originiutant Excrescence
enemy_1137_plasm.description: A twisted organism born under the combined effects of radiation mutation and Originium infection.
enemy_1137_plasm.ability: Drains 1 Objective HP when entering the Objective Point

enemy_1138_tumor.name: Originiutant Tumor
enemy_1138_tumor.description: A twisted organism born under the combined effects of radiation mutation and Originium infection. The malign tumors on these organisms' bodies still contain a large amount of hazardous substances.
enemy_1138_tumor.ability: Drains 1 Objective HP when entering the Objective Point; When blocked, significantly reduces the blocker's ASPD

enemy_1139_hologc.name: Holographic Mirage
enemy_1139_hologc.description: Tactical Originium Equipment developed by a certain Columbian tech company. Generates a realistic holographic projection to obstruct enemies.

enemy_1139_hologc_2.name: Holographic Mirage MK2
enemy_1139_hologc_2.description: The newest model of Tactical Originium Equipment developed by a certain Columbian tech company. Generates a realistic holographic projection to obstruct enemies.

enemy_1140_merhd.name: Tactical Hound
enemy_1140_merhd.description: An infected creature controlled by a Caster. Hounds are widely used by mercenaries, though some Perros object to it.

enemy_1140_merhd_2.name: Tactical Hound Pro
enemy_1140_merhd_2.description: An infected creature controlled by a Caster. Having gone through rigorous training, they now pose a much greater threat. Hounds are widely used by mercenaries, though some Perros object to it.

enemy_1141_merbow.name: Tactical Crossbowman
enemy_1141_merbow.description: A mercenary using ranged weaponry. Uses a crossbow in battle and calls for the offensive Air Support Drone 'Scrap' to carry out aerial bombardment.
enemy_1141_merbow.ability: Before the first attack, calls for <Scrap> to support the battle from the <Mobile Tactical Hangar>

enemy_1141_merbow_2.name: Tactical Crossbowman Leader
enemy_1141_merbow_2.description: A mercenary using ranged weaponry. Uses a crossbow in battle and calls for the more powerful offensive Air Support Drone 'Scrap Model-U' to carry out aerial bombardment.
enemy_1141_merbow_2.ability: Before the first attack, calls for <Scrap Model-U> to support the battle from the <Mobile Tactical Hangar>

enemy_1142_mershd.name: Tactical Defender
enemy_1142_mershd.description: A mercenary clad in heavy armor. Has extremely strong defensive capabilities and utilizes the Air Support Drone 'Anvil' to provide defensive support to their allies.
enemy_1142_mershd.ability: The first time HP drops beneath half, calls for <Anvil> to support the battle from the <Mobile Tactical Hangar>

enemy_1142_mershd_2.name: Tactical Defender Leader
enemy_1142_mershd_2.description: A mercenary clad in heavy armor. Has even stronger defensive capabilities and utilizes the more powerful Air Support Drone 'Anvil Model-B' to provide defensive support to their allies.
enemy_1142_mershd_2.ability: The first time HP drops beneath half, calls for <Anvil Model-B> to support the battle from the <Mobile Tactical Hangar>

enemy_1143_merrpg.name: Anti-Armor Infantry
enemy_1143_merrpg.description: A mercenary specializing in anti-armor combat. Carries a single-use grenade launcher which is discarded after firing along with other non-essential equipment, after which they charge at high speed towards the enemy.
enemy_1143_merrpg.ability: Can fire a super long ranged grenade, dealing AoE Physical damage; After firing, significantly increases Movement Speed and can only perform melee attacks

enemy_1143_merrpg_2.name: Anti-Armor Infantry Leader
enemy_1143_merrpg_2.description: A mercenary specializing in anti-armor combat. Carries a powerful single-use grenade launcher which is discarded after firing along with other non-essential equipment, after which they charge at high speed towards the enemy.
enemy_1143_merrpg_2.ability: Can fire a super long ranged grenade, dealing AoE Physical damage; After firing, significantly increases Movement Speed and can only perform melee attacks

enemy_1144_merlgd.name: War Phantom
enemy_1144_merlgd.description: The 'War Phantoms' were once a legendary band of mercenaries. In the wake of their bloody legacy, mercenaries and bounty hunters began referring to powerful, cruel veteran warriors with the same title. Strong and adept at controlling multiple types of Air Support Drones.
enemy_1144_merlgd.ability: On the first attack, immediately calls for <Scrap> to support the battle from the <Mobile Tactical Hangar>; When HP drops beneath half for the first time, immediately calls for <Anvil> to support the battle from the <Mobile Tactical Hangar>; When on the field, all Air Support Drones have significantly increased Movement Speed

enemy_1144_merlgd_2.name: Legendary War Phantom
enemy_1144_merlgd_2.description: The 'War Phantoms' were once a legendary band of mercenaries. Though countless others have appropriated their name, perhaps the legends themselves have yet to fall. Extremely strong and adept at controlling multiple types of Air Support Drones.
enemy_1144_merlgd_2.ability: On the first attack, immediately calls for <Scrap Model-U> to support the battle from the <Mobile Tactical Hangar>; When HP drops beneath half for the first time, immediately calls for <Anvil Model-B> to support the battle from the <Mobile Tactical Hangar>; When on the field, all Air Support Drones have significantly increased Movement Speed

enemy_1145_atkspd.name: Scrap
enemy_1145_atkspd.description: The enemy's offensive Air Support Drones. Its attacks deal AoE Physical damage and reduce the targets' DEF.
enemy_1145_atkspd.ability: Flying unit; Attacks fire two grenades, significantly reducing the DEF of the target and nearby units for a short period; Difficult to attack; Automatically retreats after some time

enemy_1145_atkspd_2.name: Scrap Model-U
enemy_1145_atkspd_2.description: The enemy's advanced offensive Air Support Drones. Its attacks deal stronger AoE Physical damage and reduce the targets' DEF.
enemy_1145_atkspd_2.ability: Flying unit; Attacks fire two grenades, significantly reducing the DEF of the target and nearby units for a short period; Difficult to attack; Automatically retreats after some time

enemy_1146_defspd.name: Anvil
enemy_1146_defspd.description: The enemy's defensive Air Support Drones. It strengthens the DEF of enemy units within range and slowly recovers their HP.
enemy_1146_defspd.ability: Flying unit; Continually provides DEF increase and HP recovery to nearby enemy units; Difficult to attack; Automatically retreats after some time

enemy_1146_defspd_2.name: Anvil Model-B
enemy_1146_defspd_2.description: The enemy's advanced defensive Air Support Drones. It greatly strengthens the DEF of enemy units within range and gradually recovers their HP.
enemy_1146_defspd_2.ability: Flying unit; Continually provides DEF increase and HP recovery to nearby enemy units; Difficult to attack; Automatically retreats after some time

enemy_1147_dshond.name: Shell Sea Runner
enemy_1147_dshond.description: A Sea Terror that grew four limbs, but lacks an internal skeleton. It seems to have once hunted quadrupeds on land.

enemy_1147_dshond_2.name: Nourished Runner
enemy_1147_dshond_2.description: A Sea Terror that grew four limbs and has sated its hunger. It controls its body's movements using hydraulic pressure and possesses superior reflexes.

enemy_1148_dssbr.name: Deep Sea Slider
enemy_1148_dssbr.description: A Sea Terror that crawled onto the shore. It brandishes its tough appendages menacingly.

enemy_1148_dssbr_2.name: Nourished Slider
enemy_1148_dssbr_2.description: A Sea Terror that crawled onto the shore and has sated its hunger. Its appendages can cause protein denaturation.

enemy_1149_dsbow.name: Ridge Sea Spitter
enemy_1149_dsbow.description: A mysterious Sea Terror. In the sea, it can spit at even greater speeds, fast enough to destroy reefs.

enemy_1149_dsbow_2.name: Nourished Spitter
enemy_1149_dsbow_2.description: A mysterious Sea Terror that has sated its hunger. Its spit is a way to deal with natural disasters, rather than as a means of hunting.

enemy_1150_dsjely.name: Floating Sea Drifter
enemy_1150_dsjely.description: A Sea Terror that floats in the air. It seems that the next generation will be even more proficient at swimming through the air.

enemy_1150_dsjely_2.name: Nourished Drifter
enemy_1150_dsjely_2.description: A Sea Terror that floats in the air and has sated its hunger. Its body contains a blazing-hot organ.

enemy_1151_dslntc.name: Basin Sea Reaper
enemy_1151_dslntc.description: A Sea Terror that emits ear-splitting screeches. Should its nourishment be interrupted, it will immediately counterattack any nearby threats, until all other signs of life have ceased.
enemy_1151_dslntc.ability: Starts battle in Standby and does not attack; After being injured, this unit becomes Combat-Ready, gradually losing HP over time and continually inflicting <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> to nearby units

enemy_1151_dslntc_2.name: Nourished Reaper
enemy_1151_dslntc_2.description: A Sea Terror that emits ear-splitting screeches and has sated its hunger. It is essentially harmless if you don't disturb it.
enemy_1151_dslntc_2.ability: Starts battle in Standby and does not attack; After being injured, this unit becomes Combat-Ready, gradually losing HP over time and continually inflicting <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> to nearby units

enemy_1152_dsurch.name: Pocket Sea Crawler
enemy_1152_dsurch.description: A Sea Terror imbued with impurities. The density of its body tissue surpasses that of some alloys. Victims stabbed by it will feel as if they have been set alight.
enemy_1152_dsurch.ability: Does not attack; Whenever a certain percentage of HP is lost, immediately deal a large amount of Arts damage and <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> to nearby units

enemy_1152_dsurch_2.name: Nourished Crawler
enemy_1152_dsurch_2.description: A Sea Terror imbued with impurities that has had its hunger sated. Such Sea Terrors are rarely seen nowadays, as they are gradually evolving to become more nimble.
enemy_1152_dsurch_2.ability: Does not attack; Whenever a certain percentage of HP is lost, immediately deal a large amount of Arts damage and <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> to nearby units

enemy_1153_dsexcu.name: Primal Sea Piercer
enemy_1153_dsexcu.description: A Sea Terror that grew a solid organ. The other parts of its body seem to be forming impregnable outer spikes.
enemy_1153_dsexcu.ability: Prioritizes attacking the target with the current lowest HP percentage within a small area

enemy_1153_dsexcu_2.name: Nourished Piercer
enemy_1153_dsexcu_2.description: A Sea Terror that grew a solid organ and has had its hunger sated. It sways gently beneath the moonlight.
enemy_1153_dsexcu_2.ability: Prioritizes attacking the target with the current lowest HP percentage within a small area

enemy_1154_dsmant.name: The First To Talk
enemy_1154_dsmant.description: The first beautiful living being to speak human language before civilized man. Seaborn.
enemy_1154_dsmant.ability: [Corrosive Vacuoles] Unleashes <Corrosive Vacuoles> that deal Physical damage and <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>. Locks-on to the target and a unit in the four adjacent tiles with the lowest <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> accumulation

enemy_1155_dsrobt.name: Automatic Maintenance Drone
enemy_1155_dsrobt.description: An old Iberian automatic maintenance drone. For some reason, it is still operational and will repair facilities.
enemy_1155_dsrobt.ability: When near a <Emergency Aid Building>, activates it and greatly enhances its ability to recover <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> damage; Will not deduct Life Points when gets retreated or destroyed, but can suffer friendly fire from allied units

enemy_2001_duckmi.name: Duck Lord
enemy_2001_duckmi.description: A Sarkaz knight with a broken horn who radiates terror and shows clear signs of excessive drug use. Uses a warhammer in battle. Crushes enemies with terrifying bloodlust. When the Withered Knight falls, takes up the quest and becomes dramatically stronger. Every step he takes spreads corruption.
enemy_2001_duckmi.ability: When unblocked, all deployed Operators lose HP constantly

enemy_2002_bearmi.name: Gopnik
enemy_2002_bearmi.description: A Sarkaz knight with a broken horn who radiates terror and shows clear signs of excessive drug use. Uses a cursed bow in battle. Can shoot multiple targets at once and plant seeds of withering arts. When the Corrupted Knight falls, takes up the quest and becomes dramatically stronger. Knights that are hostile to him will shift to Wither.
enemy_2002_bearmi.ability: This unit will not drain Objective HP when entering the Objective Point; Cannot be <$ba.stun>Stunned</>.

enemy_4001_toxcar.name: Retrofitted Gastruck
enemy_4001_toxcar.description: A pesticide spraying vehicle that used to belong to a large nomadic city. It has been retrofitted by Closure to spray tear gas instead, but she didn't have time to install an IFF system.
enemy_4001_toxcar.ability: When unblocked, all deployed Operators lose HP constantly

enemy_4001_toxcar_2.name: Supercharged Gastruck
enemy_4001_toxcar_2.description: A pesticide spraying vehicle that used to belong to a large nomadic city. It has been retrofitted by Closure to spray tear gas instead, but she didn't have time to install an IFF system. This model has an expanded gas tank and is far more dangerous.
enemy_4001_toxcar_2.ability: When unblocked, all deployed Operators lose HP constantly

enemy_4002_syokai.name: Cheap Second-hand Drone
enemy_4002_syokai.description: Cheap goods sold for scrap from the Kazimierz arenas. Feel free to waste it however you like.
enemy_4002_syokai.ability: When destroyed, grants a deployable unit; Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter.

enemy_4002_syokai_2.name: Remodeled Second-hand Drone
enemy_4002_syokai_2.description: Cheap goods sold for scrap from the Kazimierz arenas. Closure has performed some slight modifications on this batch, but it won't change the fact these are cheap as hell.
enemy_4002_syokai_2.ability: When destroyed, grants a deployable unit; Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter.

enemy_4003_pbank.name: Mobile Power Source
enemy_4003_pbank.description: An experimental prototype developed during the early years of a certain Columbian tech company. The objective was to provide power on the battlefield, however due to the lack of a positioning device, it will often leave by itself if unattended to.
enemy_4003_pbank.ability: Cannot be blocked; When destroyed, recovers the SP of nearby Operators; Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter.

enemy_1050_lslime.name: 'Pompeii'
enemy_1050_lslime.description: A massive infected beast. These aberrations were born in a special high-temperature environment. Nobody wants to approach these creatures due to their grotesque appearance and the extreme heat they give off. The existence of these giant creatures has been known since ancient times, but to see one warped by infection is terrifyingly unforgettable...
enemy_1050_lslime.ability: Attacks up to four targets simultaneously; Ignites targets it attacks, dealing burn damage over time; When blocked, self-immolates to cause high damage; Gains a large amount of ASPD when this unit's HP is under 50%.

enemy_1500_skulsr.name: Skullshatterer
enemy_1500_skulsr.description: One of Reunion's squad leaders who serves in the Assault Squad. Though armed with an Originium launcher and explosives, reports show that he possesses high mobility and poses a significant threat even in melee combat.He has been seen several times around Lungmen, and intel suggests that he is carrying out some special operation in the region.
enemy_1500_skulsr.ability: Launches grenades when not being blocked, reducing the DEF of the primary target and surrounding allied Operators significantly; Increases ATK significantly when HP is under 50%.

enemy_1502_crowns.name: Crownslayer
enemy_1502_crowns.description: One of Reunion's squad leaders who handles infiltration and assassination operations, specializing in melee combat and breaking through defensive lines. Her stealth and superb infiltration abilities have foiled countless attempts to capture her.
enemy_1502_crowns.ability: Can pass through Operators if blocked.

enemy_1503_talula.name: Talulah
enemy_1503_talula.description: The leader and spokesperson of Reunion. So far, she has been confirmed to have masterminded multiple riots, as well as the destruction of Chernobog.
enemy_1503_talula.ability: Long-ranged attacks and [Stellar Corona] deal Arts damage; When blocked, uses melee attacks that deal True damage; Applies [Burning Breath] to one target (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be <$ba.buffres>resisted</>); When HP drops beneath half, gains greatly increased DEF and RES, and uses Skills more often.

enemy_1504_cqbw.name: W
enemy_1504_cqbw.description: A Sarkaz Mercenary and one of Reunion's squad leaders, she carries around a weapon that resembles a Laterano Gun. However, she almost exclusively attacks using explosives and throwing weapons. One of her common strategies is to attack the enemy's flank using large amounts of active Originium explosives. However, her erratic movements make her almost impossible to predict...
enemy_1504_cqbw.ability: Can use explosives to deal massive physical damage;

enemy_1505_frstar.name: FrostNova
enemy_1505_frstar.description: A Caster who is one of Reunion's squad leaders. She is one of the few Casters capable of suppressing enemies in a head-on engagement. Among the squads she leads, the special 'Yeti Squadron' assists her in some special operations. As her name implies, she has a cold personality.
enemy_1505_frstar.ability: Frequently uses Arts to attack nearby Operators with an Ice Nova, dealing high Arts damage as well as slowing the AS of affected targets; Can also Freeze tiles indefinitely, making it impossible to deploy Operators on these tiles.

enemy_1507_mephi.name: Mephisto
enemy_1507_mephi.description: A Medic who is one of Reunion's squad leaders, often working in tandem with Faust. He heals the wounded while commanding his troops to attack, and can improve their life recovery rate. He boasts a high resistance to Arts. Currently, it has been confirmed that he is the one controlling the Hosts.
enemy_1507_mephi.ability: Doubles the HP regeneration of all enemies on the field; Normal attack heals 3 enemy units at a time.

enemy_1508_faust.name: Faust
enemy_1508_faust.description: A Sniper who is one of Reunion's squad leaders, often working in tandem with Mephisto. He uses extremely long-range attacks to inflict devastating physical damage. He is known to occasionally use special attacks such as summoning turret-like ballistae or launching highly destructive bolts.
enemy_1508_faust.ability: Cannot be blocked and gains invulnerability for a period of time; May attack with a special bolt dealing double damage; Regularly activates hidden turrets around the battlefield.

enemy_1509_mousek.name: 'Rat King'
enemy_1509_mousek.description: Lin, Lin Gray, the Rat King of the slum. He bears many titles, just like the shifting of the city's shadows underneath his feet. Don't touch the red lines. If you ever have a moment of indecisiveness, whatever it is that you were concerned about will become nothing more than a whisper in the winds above the dunes.
enemy_1509_mousek.ability: Greatly increased DEF when the shield is present; targets the unit with the highest Max HP with 'Singing Sands', inflicting massive Physical damage; targets the unit with the lowest Max HP with 'Sand Tomb', reducing the target's ATK and continuously inflicting Arts damage.

enemy_1510_frstar2.name: FrostNova, 'Winter's Scar'
enemy_1510_frstar2.description: Leader of the Yeti Squadron, she has released the remainder of what little life force she has left in preparation for the final battle. The biting cold of the land has already been released; are we truly prepared to make an enemy out of it?
enemy_1510_frstar2.ability: Normal attacks and Ice Novas inflict Arts damage and cause the <$ba.cold>Cold</> effect on affected targets; Ice Nova deals double damage to <$ba.frozen>Frozen</> targets; FrostNova is temporarily invulnerable during her second form, and her attacks and skills are more powerful

enemy_1506_patrt.name: Patriot
enemy_1506_patrt.description: His armor is in disrepair and damaged in many places. The blade of his once sharp halberd is now eroded with rust. However, the indomitable Patriot never capitulates, never backs down, and never shows mercy. He has long struggled with fate, and now resolves to slit the throat of fate.
enemy_1506_patrt.ability: Inspires his troops, greatly increasing their ATK and DEF; In Marching stance, he is extremely vulnerable to attacks; In Ruination stance, he uses long-ranged attacks, is immune to <$ba.stun>Stun</> effects, continuously deals True damage around him, and deals Physical damage to the farthest high ground unit.

enemy_1511_mdrock.name: Mudrock
enemy_1511_mdrock.description: Age unknown, gender unknown, history unknown. This ex-Reunion member now leads an organization of Infected and wanders the wilderness between the cities of Leithania. What thoughts run through Mudrock's mind as being forced to once again step upon the battlefield?
enemy_1511_mdrock.ability: When attacking, permanently increases ATK, stacking up to 6 times; Has a barrier that absorbs spell damage; While the barrier persists, this unit has greatly increased Max HP and ASPD; Barrier periodically refreshes; Releases a skill that automatically seizes control of the nearest non-enemy controlled 'Gramophone.'

enemy_1512_mcmstr.name: 'The Big Ugly Thing'
enemy_1512_mcmstr.description: Zumama's magnum opus, a massive mechanical monster piloted by the High Priest. It can strike both in melee range and from a distance, capable of easily destroying Giant Mushrooms and Stumps. Normal engineers cannot even fathom how a machine slapped together haphazardly like this can even move, but move it indeed does.
enemy_1512_mcmstr.ability: Periodically destroys Giant Mushrooms and Stumps, rendering them unable to be deployed upon; After this unit's HP drops to 0, it will explode, <$ba.stun>Stunning</> units in a large area and ejecting its pilot, the 'High Priest.'

enemy_1513_dekght.name: Corrupted Knight
enemy_1513_dekght.description: A Sarkaz knight with a broken horn who radiates terror and shows clear signs of excessive drug use. Uses a warhammer in battle. Crushes enemies with terrifying bloodlust. When the Withered Knight falls, takes up the quest and becomes dramatically stronger. Every step he takes spreads corruption.
enemy_1513_dekght.ability: Deals physical damage to its target and four surrounding tiles when attacking. Growth attack deals high physical damage to its target and four surrounding tiles. When the Withering Knight dies, ATK, ASPD, and movement speed are significantly increased.

enemy_1513_dekght_2.name: Withered Knight
enemy_1513_dekght_2.description: A Sarkaz knight with a broken horn who radiates terror and shows clear signs of excessive drug use. Uses a cursed bow in battle. Can shoot multiple targets at once and plant seeds of withering arts. When the Corrupted Knight falls, takes up the quest and becomes dramatically stronger. Knights that are hostile to him will shift to Wither.
enemy_1513_dekght_2.ability: Attacks two targets simultaneously. Fires explosive arrows at three targets, which explode after a short delay, dealing high Arts damage to the target and surrounding four tiles. When the Corrupted Knight dies, ATK, ASPD, and movement speed are significantly increased.

enemy_1514_smephi.name: Mephisto, 'The Singer'
enemy_1514_smephi.description: You seem to recognize the mysterious, mythical beast that has descended from the Sarcophagus. An otherworldly song flows from its sharp beak and floods its surroundings. It seems to devour the will of the Infected around it, including its own. Even if it knows not what it is doing, its song does not cease. It simply wishes to sing.
enemy_1514_smephi.ability: When Activated, heals and strengthens an enemy Host unit; Each time a certain percentage of HP is lost, releases a toxic cloud across the entire battlefield that lasts for 30s and can stack. When HP drops to 0 for the first time, enters a dormant state for a period of time, then gains DEF, RES, and HP regeneration.

enemy_1515_bsnake.name: 'The Deathless Black Snake'
enemy_1515_bsnake.description: A disenchanted Reunion soldier, or a giant manipulating history? A conspirator full of lies, or a nobleman swallowed by tragedy? The truth has been turned to ash, and only an evil god stands in the flames.
enemy_1515_bsnake.ability: Attacks deal True damage and apply [Burning Breath] to the target (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be <$ba.buffres>resisted</>); Takes greatly reduced damage from targets afflicted by [Burning Breath]; Applies [Burning Breath] to two of your units; Detonates all units on the battlefield afflicted by [Burning Breath], dealing Arts damage to the surrounding four tiles and applying [Burning Breath] to targets hit by this splash effect. When HP drops to 0, releases [Deathless Inferno], dealing massive Arts damage across the battlefield; When Enraged, gains greatly increased HP and ATK and summons [Energy Aggregates] to assist in battle.

enemy_1516_jakill.name: Jesselton Williams
enemy_1516_jakill.description: Jesselton Williams, a killer who infiltrated the prison disguised as a jailer. Very particular in both speech and action, he remains graceful even in the midst of battle.
enemy_1516_jakill.ability: In Jailer form, he has greatly increased RES, uses long-ranged Arts attacks, can <$ba.stun>Stun</> multiple targets, and does not attack Imprisonment Devices; In Killer form, he has greatly increased DEF, uses melee Physical attacks, and ignores a certain amount of the target's DEF; When changing to Killer form, immediately frees all other enemies

enemy_1517_xi.name: 'Free'
enemy_1517_xi.description: A monster drawn by Dusk. It has a commanding presence and chilling arrogance, as though taking a page out of its master's book. 'The virid beasts. Like range on range. Eleven told. In moon, smoke-flow.'
enemy_1517_xi.ability: 'Weft and Warp' deals Arts damage to enemies in the surrounding cross area, changing Hui-Ming attributes within its range; 'Break the Chains': If the shield is not yet broken, deal massive ranged damage; During second phase, attacks twice and additionally unleashes 'Weft and Warp' on farthest target.

enemy_1519_bgball.name: 'Essence of Evolution'
enemy_1519_bgball.description: A madman who should not have stepped upon this world. An oddity that should not have existed in the other world. The union of the two gave birth to this node of 'evolution' that far surpasses the limits of biology. It's existence naturally contradicts all of Terra. It should not live. It must not live.
enemy_1519_bgball.ability: Unable to move; Will evolve after a certain duration or when HP falls below a certain threshold; Periodically creates <Originiutant Excrescence> or <Originiutant Tumor>; Periodically deals a large amount of True damage to all deployed Operators; During [Newborn Form], greatly reduce Physical and Arts damage taken from units to the left; During [Evolution Form], greatly reduce Physical and Arts damage taken from units to the right; During [Perfect Form], massively reduce Physical and Arts damage taken, however lose HP every second

enemy_1520_empgrd.name: 'Emperor's Blade', Pursuer
enemy_1520_empgrd.description: He once ravaged the demons of the Northern Tundra, segregating the outsiders beyond the reach of civilization; His blade shies not from royals nor nobles, safeguarding glory from the dusts of rebellion. Every Royal Guard is as a dominion; the land beneath their feet is all the territory of Ursus.
enemy_1520_empgrd.ability: Whenever a certain percentage of HP is lost, unleashes the permanent terrain effect [Dominion], significantly reducing allied units' ASPD and reducing Physical and Arts damage taken by self when within its effect (Prioritizes targeting the ally unit outside of [Dominion] with the highest damage dealt to self); Casts [Collapsing Fear] which deals Arts damage to nearby units, instantly defeating the target if they are within [Dominion]; The first time HP drops to 0, casts [Collapsing Fear] on the entire battlefield; During his second form, his attacks and skills are more powerful

enemy_1521_dslily.name: Sal Viento Bishop Quintus
enemy_1521_dslily.description: A member of the Church of the Deep who snuck into disaster-ravaged Iberia. He changed the law of the land through his sincere beliefs, in pursuit of the perfect form, yet he was unable to fathom the will of the ocean. Then again, who could?
enemy_1521_dslily.ability: Attacks two targets with the highest DEF simultaneously; [Great Tide] deals Arts damage and <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> to all allied units; [Collapse] deals Physical damage to multiple allied units; [Fragmentation] summons its offspring to entwine themselves around allied units and <$ba.stun>Stun</> them; [Species Outbreak] removes all Life Points when a long time has passed in the battle.

enemy_2003_rockman.name: Lost Colossus
enemy_2003_rockman.description: An experimental creation of a certain caster from the Spires of Leithania. This colossus was originally made to be a 'servant,' but the old Spire caster forgot to tell him who he should serve...
enemy_2003_rockman.ability: Drains 2 Objective HP when entering the Objective Point; Can throw a rock that inflicts a very long <$ba.stun>Stun</> (will not target a unit that is already <$ba.stun>Stunned</>).

enemy_2004_balloon.name: Jetman
enemy_2004_balloon.description: One of the dessert-time jokes among Columbians involves a strange man who calls himself a 'Master Thief,' puttering around with a self-made jetpack. The most valuable thing he's stolen is a single burdenbeast. However, the fact that he made his own jetpack might mean that he really is a master.
enemy_2004_balloon.ability: Drains 5 Objective HP when entering the Objective Point; When blocked, this unit will take off for a period of time (this effect has a cooldown period).

enemy_2005_axetro.name: 'The Forsaken'
enemy_2005_axetro.description: 'The rescuers found a security guard who had been heavily corroded by Originium... already turned into a terrifying monster... carnage everywhere... countless casualties... whereabouts unknown.' —Rim Billiton mining record
enemy_2005_axetro.ability: Drains 5 Objective HP when entering the Objective Point; Continuous attacks will increase ATK and ASPD, up to a limit. This effect will reset after a few seconds after this unit stops attacking.

enemy_2006_flsnip.name: Rusthammer Warrior
enemy_2006_flsnip.description: 'Rusthammer' is a violent organization that has broken away from civilization to wander the wastelands. In these barren wastes, far from the comforts offered by nomadic city-states, life itself is an endless war.
enemy_2006_flsnip.ability: Drains 30 Objective HP when entering the Objective Point; Cannot be blocked, and is Invulnerable for a period of time after entering the battle; Periodically releases a special bolt that deals massive Arts damage.

enemy_2007_flwitch.name: 'Frozen Monstrosity'
enemy_2007_flwitch.description: A Sami sacrificant went to the endless tundra to defend against the demons that invaded her homeland. In the end, she went insane and became a part of the tundra's curse.
enemy_2007_flwitch.ability: Drains 30 Objective HP when entering the Objective Point; Normal attacks and Ice Novas deal Arts damage and inflict the <$ba.cold>Cold</> status; If a target is defeated or retreats while <$ba.frozen>Frozen</>, its Redeployment Time is doubled; Can activate Originium Ice Crystals around the battlefield.

enemy_2008_flking.name: 'Gravestone'
enemy_2008_flking.description: A cruel murderer, an assassin that pursues you relentlessly. The violence bred in this land will eventually grow inside every perpetrator.
enemy_2008_flking.ability: Drains 30 Objective HP when entering the Objective Point; Halves the ATK and DEF of all your units on the battlefield; Halves natural DP regeneration rate; Doubles Redeployment Time; Periodically gains a shield proportional to Max HP.
